metadata.title: CVE-2019-14888 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in the Undertow HTTP server in versions before 2.0.28.SP1 when listening on HTTPS. An attacker can target the HTTPS port to carry out a Denial Of Service (DOS) to make the service unavailable on SSL.

criterions.comment: undertow package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
